SELECT YEAR(openDate) AS 'year', SUM(balance) AS 'balance' , SUM(totalPoint) AS 'totalPoint' , SUM(totalConsumption) AS 'totalConsumption' , SUM(totalRecharge) AS 'totalRecharge' FROM membercard GROUP BY YEAR(openDate)

select quarter(openDate) as 'quarter',sum(balance) as 'balance' ,sum(totalPoint) as 'totalPoint' ,sum(totalConsumption) as 'totalConsumption' ,sum(totalRecharge) as 'totalRecharge' FROM membercard WHERE
year(openDate)=#{markYear}
year(openDate)=year(now())
group by quarter(openDate)

select month(openDate) as 'month',sum(balance) as 'balance' ,sum(totalPoint) as 'totalPoint' ,sum(totalConsumption) as 'totalConsumption' ,sum(totalRecharge) as 'totalRecharge' FROM membercard WHERE
year(openDate)=#{markYear}
year(openDate)=year(now())
group by month(openDate)
select distinct year(openDate) as 'year' from membercard order by year(openDate) asc

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(changetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS times, SUM(rechargeMoney) AS 'money' FROM cardrechargerecord WHERE changetime >= DATE_SUB( #{time}, INTERVAL WEEKDAY(#{time}) DAY ) AND changetime <= DATE_ADD( DATE_SUB( #{time}, INTERVAL WEEKDAY(#{time}) DAY ), INTERVAL 7 DAY ) GROUP BY times ORDER BY times
